pr_title: Replace the system.out.printlns in the ThreadLeakageChecker with debug log or error log to avoid verbose output.

timeline.message:
Replace the system.out.printlns in the ThreadLeakageChecker with debug log or error log to avoid verbose output.

This is a pure test code change. No logic change.

timeline.author: huizhilu

timeline.bodyText: Nit: LOG.info may be better. Otherwise, it is hard for people using it to see the leaked thread if they wish as they need to turn on debug. which can result in a lot more other lines.
timeline.author: kaisun2000

replies.bodyText: This is the main source of verbose output. Before we enforce it, I think it is not a good idea to output it. Note that for now, EVERY single test class prints these 100 lines.
replies.author: jiajunwang
